message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value. While I can't disclose the specific details, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm willing to part with it for a price of $1000000.  This represents a substantial opportunity for you to secure a valuable asset.  Consider this offer carefully.  If you decline, I will be selling it to another buyer for $800000.
